actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the Internal Revenue Service's proposed revenue procedure on private tax-exempt schools.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Internal Revenue Service should not adopt the "Proposed Revenue Procedure on Private Tax-Exempt Schools", which sets forth guidelines for determining whether a private school has forfeited its tax-exempt status by the adoption of racially discriminatory policies.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to the Internal Revenue Service's proposed revenue procedure on private tax-exempt schools.
